title: Executive Order 6049-Authorizing the Appointment of Milton Harold Powell
content: Mr. Milton Harold Powell may be appointed as apprentice boy (electrician), Cu-1, in the office of the Director of Public Buildings and Public Parks of the National Capital, without regard to the requirements of the civil-service rules.
This order is issued upon the recommendation of the Director of said office.
citation: Herbert Hoover, Executive Order 6049-Authorizing the Appointment of Milton Harold Powell Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/361599
